description: A soft crystal-like mineral with a very distinguishing orange glow as if on fire. Used as conduit and in the bio-chemical industry. Commonly found in many asteroid-ore types. May be obtained by reprocessing the following ores and their variations: High security status star systems: Scordite, Pyroxeres Low security status star systems: Pyroxeres, Omber, Hedbergite, Gneiss, Crokite Null security status star systems: Pyroxeres, Bistot, Arkonor Wormhole systems: Pyroxeres, Omber, Gneiss, Bistot, Arkonor The rare ore Mordunium also contains significant quantities and is found primarily in nullsec and W-space systems containing A0 (Blue Small) stars, as well as surveyed locations on the borders of empire and nullsec space.
name: Pyerite
